com.samsung.spensdk.applistener

Interface SCanvasModeChangedListener


  • public interface SCanvasModeChangedListener
    This is the S-Canvas-based listener interface for S-Canvas mode changes.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.2

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onColorPickerModeEnabled(boolean bEnableColorPickerMode)
      This handler is called when an SCanvas color picker mode is enabled or disabled.
      void onModeChanged(int mode)
      This handler is called when an S-Canvas input mode changes.
      void onMovingModeEnabled(boolean bEnableMovingMode)
      This handler is called when an SCanvas moving mode is enabled or disabled.

    • Method Detail

      • onModeChanged

        void onModeChanged(int mode)
        This handler is called when an S-Canvas input mode changes.
        Parameters:
        mode - The new mode
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2

      • onMovingModeEnabled

        void onMovingModeEnabled(boolean bEnableMovingMode)
        This handler is called when an SCanvas moving mode is enabled or disabled.
        Parameters:
        bEnableMovingMode - Whether or not moving mode is enabled
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3

      • onColorPickerModeEnabled

        void onColorPickerModeEnabled(boolean bEnableColorPickerMode)
        This handler is called when an SCanvas color picker mode is enabled or disabled.
        Parameters:
        bEnableMovingMode - Whether or not color picker mode is enabled
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3
